name: Trijam 15: Hard Decisions
description:
• I made this game in three hours, twenty three minutes, and twenty three seconds.
  • It's very bad.
  • The idea was to have the player be a mineral who fought harder and harder minerals.
  • I didn't really achieve the experience I was hoping for.
  • Controls are arrow keys / wasd and space/enter.
  • There is a wall that will push you if you don't move.
  • The hard decision comes after a run: you have to pick what to improve.
  • The longer you survive, the bigger the improvement. There is a timer at the bottom of the screen.
  • There is no sound.
